*TEST pset (lagrit_input1)
cmo/create/abc
surface/pbot/reflect/plane/0,0,0/1,0,0/1,1,0/
surface/ptop/reflect/plane/0,0,1/1,0,1/1,1,1/
surface/prgt/reflect/plane/1,0,0/1,1,0/1,1,1/
surface/plft/reflect/plane/0,0,0/0,1,0/0,1,1/
surface/pfrt/reflect/plane/0,0,0/1,0,0/1,0,1/
surface/pbck/reflect/plane/0,1,0/1,1,0/1,1,1/
surface/mid/intrface/plane/0,0,.5/1,0,.5/1,1,.5/
*define geometric regions
region/top/ ge pbot and le ptop and ge plft and le prgt  &
              and ge pbck and le pfrt and ge mid  /
region/bot/ ge pbot and le ptop and ge plft and le prgt  &
              and ge pbck and le pfrt and lt mid  /
* define material regions
mregion/mattop/ ge pbot and le ptop and ge plft and le prgt &
              and ge pbck and le pfrt and gt mid /
mregion/matbot/ ge pbot and le ptop and ge plft and le prgt  &
              and ge pbck and le pfrt and lt mid  /
rz/xyz/3,3,3/0,0,0/1,1,1/1,1,1
setpts
connect
settets
pset/p0/surface/prgt
zq/xic/pset,get,p0
cmo/printatt/abc/-xyz-/pset,get,p0/
zq/xic////
cmo/printatt/abc/-xyz-//
pset/p0/list
pset/p0/delete
pset/p0/surface/mid
pset/p0/list
pset/p0/delete
pset/p0/surface/mid/1,0,0
pset/p0/list
pset/p0/delete
pset/p0/surface/-all-
pset/p0/list
pset/p0/delete
pset/p0/surface/-interface-
pset/p0/list
pset/p0/delete
pset/p0/surface/-boundary-/1,0,0
pset/p0/list
pset/p0/delete
pset/p1/region/top
pset/p2/region/top/1,0,0
pset/p1/list
pset/p2/list
pset/p1/delete
*pset/p1/region/mid
pset/p1/surface/ptop
pset/p1/list
*pset/p0/surface/abc/1,0,0
pset/p3/union/p1/p2
pset/p3/list
pset/p4/inter/p1/p3
pset/p4/list
pset/p2/delete
pset/p2/surface/pbck
pset/p2/list
pset/p5/not/p1/p2
pset/p5/list
pset/p8/seq/19,19,1
pset/p8/list
pset/p9/not/p1/p2/p8
pset/p9/list
pset/p6/not/p1
pset/p6/list
pset/p7/not/p2
pset/p7/list
pset/p8/attribute/xic/1,0,0/.1/lt
pset/p9/attribute/xic/1,0,0/ne .1
pset/p10/attribute/xic/1,0,0/0./eq
pset/p11/attribute/xic/1,0,0/0./ne
pset/p12/attribute/xic/1,0,0/GT/.9
dump/gmv/output_pset.gmv
*begin compare here
cmo/status
cmo/printatt//-all-/minmax
quality
finish
